text: Vincent Arthur Maria van der Burg (17 April 1945 – 29 April 2020) was a Dutch politician. Van der Burg was born in Zeist. He was a member of the KVP, later changed into CDA. He was active in the Dutch House of Representatives for almost 19 years. Van den Burg died in Zeist on 29 April 2020, aged 75.Oud- Tweede Kamerlid Vincent van der Burg uit Zeist overleden, RTV Utrecht, 2 May 2020.Oud-CDA-Tweede Kamerlid Vincent van der Burg overleden, Parlement.com, 2 May 2020. ==References== ==External links== *Biography at “parlement.com” Category:1945 births Category:2020 deaths Category:People from Zeist Category:Catholic People's Party politicians Category:Christian Democratic Appeal politicians Category:Members of the House of Representatives (Netherlands)
title: Vincent van der Burg
